basics.name: Johnathan Yesid Silva Parra
basics.label: Mobile Developer
basics.summary: As a Mobile Developer, I stand out for my ability to collaborate effectively in a team, adapt to new environments, and learn quickly. I possess the technical skills necessary to perform excellently in the workplace, contributing to business growth through the delivery of positive results. My focus is on fully satisfying client needs, ensuring an optimal user experience, and generating added value for the organization.

work.name: Apex Global Mobility
work.summary: I participated in the design, development, and implementation of B2B and B2C mobile and web solutions for the distribution of CBC products, focusing on efficiency, automation, and cross-platform support.
highlights: I served as Technical Leader, leading 3 work teams and getting involved in the entire development flow, from planning to final delivery.
I deployed mobile applications in the Google Play and Apple Store.
I implemented CD with Bitrise for mobile applications, achieving continuous and efficient delivery.

work.name: Yalutec
work.summary: I led the development of 'Loyalty', a loyalty program created with Flutter, achieving a consistent user experience on iOS, Android, and Web.

work.name: Venko
work.summary: I participated in the design, development, and implementation of mobile and cross-platform solutions focused on automation, productivity, health, and code generation, using technologies such as Flutter, Kotlin, and OpenCV.
highlights: I served as Mobile Leader, getting involved in the entire development flow, from planning to final delivery.
I provided consulting services on behalf of Venko, helping companies improve their development processes and resource optimization.

work.name: Actions Tracker S.L.
work.summary: I participated in the design, development, and implementation of 'IvAdventure', an application for automation and intelligent control of devices based on BLE and WiFi, aimed at optimizing traditional switches and meters through a centralized system with ESP32.

work.name: High Developer
work.summary: I participated in the design, development, and implementation of mobile solutions oriented towards IoT, health, security, management, and services, using technologies such as Android-Java, Xamarin, Flutter, Swift, and Firebase.

education.institution: Integrated School Our Lady of Mercedes
